New Records: Trent Boult became the sixth New Zealand player to take 200 ODI wickets.
Key Match Events: Mushfiqur Rahim scored a half-century, contributing 66 runs off 75 balls.
Mushfiqur Rahim formed a crucial 96-run partnership with Shakib Al Hasan.
Trent Boult dismissed Towhid Hridoy to claim his 200th ODI wicket.
Trent Boult dismissed Liton Das off the first ball of the match.
Shakib Al Hasan scored 40 runs before being caught by Tom Latham.
Mahmudullah added a valuable undefeated 41 runs batting at number eight.
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Kane Williamson returned to action after recovering from a knee injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shakib Al Hasan ended his innings suffering from cramps and batting without a helmet or cap against the spinners.
Liton Das was celebrating his 29th birthday but was dismissed for a low score.
